faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you want to know about our website subscriptions

q1.question: What are the startup costs?
q1.answer: None! You only pay the monthly subscription. We invest in building your website.

q2.question: How long until my website is live?
q2.answer: On average 2 weeks after completing the questionnaire. Webshops may take slightly longer.

q3.question: Can I modify my website later?
q3.answer: Absolutely! Small adjustments are included for free. For major changes, we'll provide a quote.

q4.question: What if I want to cancel?
q4.answer: You can cancel monthly. After cancellation, you can take over your website for a one-time fee.

q5.question: Will my website rank well on Google?
q5.answer: Yes! All websites are SEO-optimized. Professional and Business packages include extra SEO tools.

q6.question: Can I use my own domain?
q6.answer: Certainly! You can connect your existing domain or we'll register a new one for you.
